title: Rooibos Chickpea Patties
description: Use rooibos tea as binding liquid for chickpea burgers.

title: Rooibos Roasted Veggies
description: Drizzle rooibos reduction over roasted seasonal vegetables.

title: Rooibos Mashed Potatoes
description: Infuse milk with rooibos before mashing with potatoes.

description: Simmer lentils and veggies in rooibos for hearty soup.

description: Drizzle rooibos reduction over roasted seasonal vegetables.

description: Use rooibos to cook rice and layer with spiced vegetables or meat.

title: Rooibos BBQ Marinade
